channel.title: Help with Allstar-scape source
channel.description: I was using the Rs2hd source with some 508 client i downloaded and every thing worked fine, and still does. but then i noticed that there where hardly any tuts for it, so i decided to download the Allstar-scape V2 source because there are a bunch of tuts for that kind of source. When i loaded the allstar server up, it said "Online!", so then i noticed that the only clients that "worked" for it where the silab one, and my custom one, by "worked" i mean i at least seen some response from the command prompt. All the other types of clients gave me the "error_game.js5connect" error. And that's why im here to ask someone to help me figure out what is wrong because this is what the command prompt had to say: [code]Connection accepted from MACHINE: 2805. Client type: high memory version UserId: 23481457 Admin is signing onto server. Admin: character file not found. Admin: moreinfo file not found. Admin: error writing file. LOADED: 3 java.io.FileNotFoundException: connectedfrom\Admin.txt (The system cannot find t he path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:177) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:102) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(FileWriter.java:61) at client.appendConnected(client.java:10613) at client.run(client.java:10856) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Admin: moreinfo file not found. Admin: error writing file. Could not save for _ ClientHandler: Client _ disconnected. [/code]

item.title: Help with Allstar-scape source
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

You stfu and stop giving bad advice, I should report you for leading all these people astray. You have no idea what you are talking about and should refrain from posting.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Allstar-scape source
item.dc:creator: @x1_f4t3_1x x1 f4t3 1x
item.description:
@x1_f4t3_1x wrote:

its because allstar-scape is a 317 base, you can only run it with a 317 client, if you don’t, that is what will happen. if it is not ONLINE and that is that you are talking about, PM me and i will help you.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Allstar-scape source
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

You need to make an Admin.txt file in connectedfrom. You can tell from this part of the error.

java.io.FileNotFoundException: connectedfrom\Admin.txt (The system cannot find t he path specified)

You are also missing the moreinfo char file and connectfrom folders judging by this error,

Admin: error writing file.

I recommend downloading my reapage scape with thread fix server (Located in the link in my siggy)

This is basically the same source except with more features and I have added the thread fix which stops spammers nulls etc. (Also reduces lag :eek:)

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Allstar-scape source
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

Maybe it is calling something to be saved and is unable to find it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Allstar-scape source
item.dc:creator: @Reisyukaku Reisyukaku
item.description:
@Reisyukaku wrote:

I was using the Rs2hd source with some 508 client i downloaded and every thing worked fine, and still does. but then i noticed that there where hardly any tuts for it, so i decided to download the Allstar-scape V2 source because there are a bunch of tuts for that kind of source. When i loaded the allstar server up, it said “Online!”, so then i noticed that the only clients that “worked” for it where the silab one, and my custom one, by “worked” i mean i at least seen some response from the command prompt. All the other types of clients gave me the “error_game.js5connect” error. And that’s why im here to ask someone to help me figure out what is wrong because this is what the command prompt had to say:

Connection accepted from MACHINE: 2805. Client type: high memory version UserId: 23481457 Admin is signing onto server. Admin: character file not found. Admin: moreinfo file not found. Admin: error writing file. LOADED: 3 java.io.FileNotFoundException: connectedfrom\Admin.txt (The system cannot find t he path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:177) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:102) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(FileWriter.java:61) at client.appendConnected(client.java:10613) at client.run(client.java:10856) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Admin: moreinfo file not found. Admin: error writing file. Could not save for _ ClientHandler: Client _ disconnected.
